features: EASY TO DIGEST: Partially hydrolyzed whey protein to help with easy digestion
GENTLE FORMULA + IMMUNE SUPPORT: Similac Pro-Total Comfort is a gentle formula with 2'-FL HMO, a prebiotic that helps strengthen your baby’s immune system
SUPPORTS BRAIN & EYES: Has DHA and lutein, important ingredients found in breast milk
NO PALM OLEIN OIL: Has no palm olein oil to support excellent calcium absorption
SIMILAC IS THE #1 INFANT FORMULA BRAND FED IN HOSPITALS

NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES§ & NON-GMO||: Similac is the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormones. Similac Pro-Total Comfort contains ingredients that are not genetically engineered
body.description: Similac Pro-Total Comfort* is a gentle formula with 2'-FL human milk oligosaccharide† (2'-FL HMO), an immune-nourishing prebiotic like that found‡ in breast milk that supports baby’s developing immune system. It’s an easy-to-digest formula for babies with fussiness, gas, and crying who have difficulty tolerating other milk-based formulas. * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. † Not from human milk. ‡ At significant levels. § No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows. ‖ Ingredients not genetically engineered.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Support for Baby’s Immune System Similac Pro-Total Comfort* with 2-FL human milk oligosaccharide† (HMO) is complete nutrition designed to strengthen your baby’s immune system. 2-FL HMO is an immune-nourishing prebiotic like that found‡ in breast milk. It is backed by more than 20 years of research. * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. † Not from human milk. ‡ At significant levels.

Supports Brain & Eye Development Similac Pro-Total Comfort infant formula has our exclusive blend of DHA, lutein, and vitamin E. DHA supports brain development, lutein supports eye development, and vitamin E is an important nutrient that supports developing cells. No Palm Olein Oil Formulas with no palm olein oil have been shown to promote softer stools for your baby, more like breastfed infants. And our no palm olein oil fat blend supports excellent calcium absorption for strong bones. Feeding Resources No matter how you choose to feed your baby, Similac is here to support your journey. The Similac Feeding Expert team can provide nutrition support and feeding advice when you need it. MySimilac Rewards With MySimilac Rewards, get nutrition guidance for you and baby, exclusive benefits, coupons, and much more.

Similac Pro-Total Comfort* Similac Pro-Sensitive* Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive Similac Alimentum Complete Nutrition for Infants ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Has DHA, Lutein, and Vitamin E ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Has 2-FL HMO for Immune Support ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Has 5-HMO Prebiotic Blend Including 2-FL HMO ✓ For Fussiness & Gas Due to Lactose Sensitivity ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Partially Hydrolyzed Whey Protein for Easy Digestion ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic for Cow's Milk Allergy ✓ *Not for infants or children with galactosemia ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked perfectly fine
reviews.reviewText: Easy to mix up. Worked for our LO. Decent price for amount you got. Liked that it came in a stock amount so we had less ordering to do constantly or running to the store for more. Used it after breastfeeding and the transition went well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was such a great deal!
reviews.reviewText: Everyone knows formula is such an annoying necessity because it’s so expensive and a lot of times hard to find, so to be able to buy it in bulk and save some money is awesome. I’m almost through my first can in the pack and it’s exactly what it’s supposed to be and fresh too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I received this container of formula for the first time and my husband and I noticed it was not dissolving or mixing correctly. I decided to call the company directly to see if this was normal and they said that this would have to do with extreme heat exposure. They offered to not only replace the container, but to send us a CASE of formula. I was not expecting that at all. For that alone, I am happy to continue to support this brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great formula for babies with gas and constipation!
reviews.reviewText: All 4 of my kids have a hard time digesting the proteins in other formulas. This one is great because the proteins are already partially broken down and makes it easy for their underdeveloped tummies to process it. A lot of other formulas also can constipate your babies. But similac doesn’t because it doesn’t contain any palm oil! My only complaint is that my youngest absolutely didn’t like the taste of it and we had to switch to another formula as he got older. But, it worked great for his tummy as a newborn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the formula, not so happy with this deal. I spent $200 for six cans that all expire at the end of the month. Baby better drink real quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to buy in bulk!
reviews.reviewText: Twice so far this has come within 3 days of ordering! Always prioritized, can use similac coupons and it’s even cheaper than buying at Walmart! Will be getting this every 6 weeks until my babe is off formula!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the bigger size saves money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thank you similac for fulfilling through Amazon
reviews.reviewText: This is quick and we can always use a coupon. Thank you
